subtitleNullable: Analyze the thriving NFT Polygon market leveraging on the Aavegotchi protocol.
descriptionNullable:
#  Welcome to the Aavegotchi Rabbithole

![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F7796991%2Fb53949ac349111ab82666c0d00c391c1%2Fgotchisun.png?generation=1670934029339188&alt=media)




Aavegotchi NFT general info  : https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/

Aavegotchi_sales.csv: Sales from gotchis market:

- $GHST_price: price at which the gotchi was sold in the cryptocurrency $GHST
- ID: ID of the gotchi
- BRS: Base Rarity Score of the gotchi, it is calculated from its traits : 
 if (number < 50): 
       return 100 - number
 else: 
       return number + 1
- HAUNT: Which haunt the gotchi belongs to, Haunt 1(Edition1): 10000, Haunt2: 15000
- Wearables: The wearables gotchis were wearing the moment they sold, comes in a list which represents the body slot of the gotchi as follows : Body/Face/Eyes/Head/LHands/RHands/Pet/Background 
- Seller: Seller address
- Buyer: Buyer address
- MBRS: Modified Basic Rarity Score, takes into account the effects from the wearables, which modify the BRS of the gotchis
- Wearables additional data: https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/en/wearables
![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F7796991%2Fb32b5cff479b3ebf7e9832d34668fc94%2Fgotchitraits2.png?generation=1670932622836036&alt=media)

- nrgTrait: Energy trait of the gotchi.
- aggTrait: Aggression trait of the gotchi.
- spkTrait: Spookyness trait of the gotchi.
- brnTrait: Brain trait of the gotchi
- eysTrait: Eyeshape trait of the gotchi
- eyecTrait: Eyecolour trait of the gotchi
- Date: Sell day
- $USD_price: Price of $GHST (daily mean) @ the day of the sell.
![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F7796991%2F33ca17b185e8af3e5762561c39521fe8%2Fwearables.png?generation=1670932799509596&alt=media)

Wearable_sales.csv: Sales from the wearables market
- $GHST_price: price at which the wearable was sold in the cryptocurrency $GHST
- WearID : Wearable ID, corresponds to a wearable name
- Rarity: Rarity level of the wearable: {0:Common,1:Uncommon,2:Rare,3:Legendary,4:Mythical,5:Godlike}
- Quantity: Number of the same ID wearable sold
- Seller: Seller address
- Buyer: Buyer address
- Date: Sell day
- $USD_price: Price of $GHST (daily mean) @ the day of the sell.

GHST.csv: Daily close price of the $GHST cryptocurrency.
![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F7796991%2F3290aca1a8afe80e33cb026686364e90%2Fghstprice.png?generation=1670932938413258&alt=media)

Source: Coingecko API
title: Aavegotchi Gotchis & Wearable sales 2020-2022
subtitle: Analyze the thriving NFT Polygon market leveraging on the Aavegotchi protocol.
